text.section:
The political subdivision shall:
Select a reasonable basis for imposing the sewer service charge; and
Collect the sewer service charge once, twice, or four times a year.

If any bill for sewer service remains unpaid after 60 days from the date the bill was sent:
The bill shall be collectible from the owner of the property served in the same manner and subject to the same interest as taxes are collectible in the county in which the water or sewerage system lies; and
The sewer service charges shall be a first lien on the property.
